text: Nelson Meurer (July 23, 1942 – July 12, 2020), was a Brazilian Progressistas politician. He represented the state of Paraná at national level. From 1995 to 2019, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies. From 1989 to 2013, he was Mayor of Francisco Beltrão. Meurer was born in Bom Retiro, Santa Catarina. Meurer died on July 12, 2020 in Francisco Beltrão from COVID-19, aged 77.Ex- deputado Nelson Meurer morre aos 77 anos vítima de COVID-19 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian mayors Category:Politicians from Paraná State
title: Nelson Meurer
